title: Identify this font please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/themaxfont_6446.jpg)

 [‹ ID: Crafty looking font from a website](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41400 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID this logo: KATSUYA ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41423 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content: Looks like a sort of hand-done [Brush Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/atf/brush-script/).
